SEARCH
Package HMS.src.user

Class Administrator

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.user.User
HMS.src.user.Administrator
public class Administrator extends User
Represents an Administrator in the Hospital Management System. The Administrator is responsible for managing staff, appointments, and medication inventory, as well as approving or rejecting replenishment requests.
